Parameters

driverVersion uint

Driver version.

buildBranch string

Driver build branch.

isDchDriver bool

True if the driver is DCH.

isNvidiaStudioPackage bool

True if the driver is an NVIDIA Studio package.

isNvidiaGameReadyPackage bool

True if the driver is a Game Ready package.

isNvidiaRtxProductionBranchPackage bool

True if the driver is an RTX Production Branch package.

isNvidiaRtxNewFeatureBranchPackage bool

True if the driver is an RTX New Feature Branch package.

buildBaseBranch string

Driver build base branch.

reservedEx uint

Reserved field value.
